headline: Show HN: Hagrid – Social QnA for any webpage
description:
https://hagrid.io - Need to signup for a free trial to use the product (does not need a credit card or any payment).

For the past few months, we have been building hagrid, a no-code social QnA widget, that lets you add an interactive FAQ section to any webpage in 10 minutes!

Visitors can ask questions, and we (the website owners) can respond. The questions and answers are public; unlike customer-support e-mails and chat, which are lost for ever, and born again every day. So you get two big advantages: 1. Social proof & the resulting trust - see and hear other people “in the room” 2. A living breathing FAQ section - populated by your users We’ve heard a lot from our users and have built out these amazing features for version 2.0: 1. Seed your own FAQ, order questions anyway you like, filter by page 2. Automatic zero-effort SEO - feed your QnA to Google FAQ schema 3. Rich editing, automatic embedding of Youtube Videos and Tweets 4. Customise, to the pixel, match brand colours, fonts and identity

And also users are authenticated, they "log in" to post so: * No SPAM! * Reach the users even after they have left the website

Visitors can post questions anonymously, and website owners do not have access to user details, other than the public username (not even that if you are anonymous). Visitors “log in” (with Social OAuth) to hagrid only. hagrid protects user privacy and anonymity, while letting website owners respond and reach visitors.

You can integrate with just about any platform, including Webflow, Wordpress, Shopify, your React Site or just with plain JS on the page. We use hagrid too. Head to hagrid.io and ask us anything! -- Vinod
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 海格--适用于任何网页的社交问答
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 海格--適用於任何網頁的社交問答
description_zh-Hans:
https://hagrid.io - 需要注册免费试用才能使用该产品（不需要信用卡或任何付款）。

在过去的几个月里，我们一直在构建hagrid，一个没有代码的社交QnA小工具，让你在10分钟内为任何网页添加一个互动的FAQ部分！

访问者可以提出问题，而我们（网站所有者）可以做出回应。这些问题和答案是公开的；不像客户支持电子邮件和聊天，它们会永远消失，并每天重生。 因此，你有两个大的优势。1. 社会证明&；由此产生的信任--看到和听到其他人 "在房间里" 2. 一个活生生的常见问题部分--由你的用户填充 我们从用户那里听到了很多，并为2.0版本建立了这些惊人的功能。 1. 种植你自己的FAQ，按你喜欢的方式排列问题，按页面过滤 2. 2.自动的零努力的SEO--将你的QnA输入到谷歌的FAQ模式中。 3. 丰富的编辑，自动嵌入Youtube视频和推特 4. 4.自定义，以像素为单位，与品牌颜色、字体和身份相匹配

而且用户是经过认证的，他们可以登录并发布信息，因此。 * 没有垃圾邮件! *即使在用户离开网站后也能联系到他们

访问者可以匿名发布问题，网站所有者无法获得用户的详细信息，除了公开的用户名（如果你是匿名的，甚至没有）。访客只在hagrid "登录"（使用Social OAuth）。hagrid保护用户隐私和匿名，同时让网站所有者回应和接触访客。

你可以与几乎任何平台整合，包括Webflow、Wordpress、Shopify、你的React网站或只是在页面上使用普通JS。我们也使用hagrid。请前往 hagrid.io，向我们提出任何问题! -- Vinod
